title: TRANSFORMERS: Dark of the Moon
description: The Games on Demand version supports  English, French, Italian, German, Spanish.  The TRANSFORMERS: Dark of the Moon video game thrusts players directly into an original prologue storyline to experience the epic battles on Earth that will shape the events of the blockbuster film.  Armed with a new gameplay mechanic called Stealth Force, fans will be able to instantly convert to a third, hybrid state that combines the weapons and firepower of Robot Mode with the agility and maneuverability of Vehicle Mode.  Set in unique environments around the world such as the Jungles of Central America, Siberian military facilities, Detroit Cityscapes and more, the game lets players assume the roles of a diverse roster of everyone’s favorite TRANSFORMERS from the movie through a heart-pounding campaign to save mankind.  Additionally, fans can play the game with or against their friends through intense, online multiplayer game modes as their favorite iconic characters.

contentRating.label: T (Teen)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: SIDESWIPE - Playable Multi-Player Character
childDownloads.description: SIDESWIPE lives to fight, and while he generally prefers his swords, recently, IRONHIDE has convinced him to give blasters another chance. He hunts the DECEPTICONS around the world, destroying them wherever he can find them. With his blades extended and his wheels on the ground, no one can stop him!  SIDESWIPE is an original AUTOBOT, one with a long legacy in the Transformers universe.  With a role in Revenge of the Fallen, he showcased his melee skills and agility.  In the Dark of The Moon game, he is now armed with a Scoped Burst Rifle for ranged combat as well as his powerful Cybertanium arm blades that allow for a powerful whirlwind attack.  He compliments the other AUTOBOT Scouts as MIRAGE and BUMBLEBEE are geared towards short and mid-range combat whereas SIDESWIPE can be dangerous from any range.  SIDESWIPE is a scout character, quick on his feet (wheels) and ready to mix it up with DECEPTICONS.  He excels at hit and run tactics, and can effortlessly move in and out of fights in both robot and vehicle form.  Gamers who prefer speed and melee capabilities should look to SIDESWIPE as a class-A specimen.
